label: Contest Accuracy
definition: Justification that the process should be carried out due it being an objection to the accuracy e.g. of system, outputs, data

label: Exercise Justification
definition: Justification for why the process should be carried out

label: Information Society Services Offer
definition: Justification that the process should be carried out due to it being related to the offer of information society services

label: Legal Obligation
definition: Justification that the process should be carried out due to it being a legal obligation

label: Legality Lacking Objection
definition: Justification that the process should be carried out due to it being an objection to the lack of further legality or legal basis of specified context

label: Non Necessity Objection
definition: Justification that the process should be carried out due to it being an objection to the non-necessity of specified context

label: Objection
definition: Justification that the process should be carried out due to specified objection(s)

label: Unlawful Activity Objection
definition: Justification that the process should be carried out due to it being an objection of unlawful activity
